projects.name: Knit Mittens
projects.description: Wonderfully warm ribbed knit mittens. The brioche stitch allows for a colorful, fun striped pattern.

projects.name: Embroidered Trees
projects.description: Using seed stitches, back stitches, and satin stitches, create a perfect wall hanging for any rustic cabin!

projects.name: Darned Socks
projects.description: Never throw away another sock! Mending your own socks is fun and simple.

projects.name: Crocheted Doll
projects.description: Create a doll with anyone's likeness with this advanced crochet pattern!

projects.name: Embroidered Jungle
projects.description: Ready to step up your embroidery game? Check out this embroidered jungle filled with complicated stitches.

projects.name: Bubble sweater
projects.description: A big, chunky bubble sweater. Surprisingly easy!
